name: Skelly (Saschanian)
description:
PLEASE PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION OF THE GAME SINCE THE WEBGL VERSION IS CURRENTLY NOT PLAYABLE.

---- KNOWN BUGS ----

1. The player is currently unable to lose health. I will work hard to upload a fixed version as an alternative soon.

2. The pause menu is pretty ugly on some floors. This will hopefully be fixed soon.

Skelly just awoke from his tomb and is now faces with a seemingly endless staircase. Will he be able to fight through and reach the top?

In Skelly you play a little skeleton and can use his four abilities to fight through enemies to reach the topmost floor of the tower. On your way you will fight bats, spiders and even other skeletons. Even a suprise enemy awaits in the tower!
